enb_long_title: Twelfth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Working Group III (WGIII-12) and Thirty-ninth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-39)
section_title: MATTERS RELATED TO UNFCCC AND OTHER RELATED BODIES
sentences: Florin Vladu, UNFCCC, presented on various COP decisions where the IPCC's work was recognized, including on research and systematic observation and annual GHG inventories, and noted numerous upcoming UNFCCC side-events where IPCC presentations were expected.
